---
format: pdf
keep-tex: true
title: "Long Table kable fixups etc"
_quarto:
  tests:
    pdf:
      ensureLatexFileRegexMatches:
        - ['\\begin\{longtable\*\}']
        - ['\\begin\{longtable\}']
---

## Raw longtable table with no crossref and no caption

In this case, Quarto will transform to longtable* 

```{r}
#| echo: false
df <- tibble::tibble(
  x = 1:20,
  y = rnorm(20),
  z = rnorm(20)
)
knitr::kable(df, 
  format = "latex", 
  longtable = TRUE, 
  booktabs = TRUE)
```
